sentences.sContent: People are concerned about corruption and social inequality.
sentences.sCn: 人们对腐败和社会不公感到担忧。

phrases.pCn: 一次不等式；线性不等式
三角形公理；三角不等式

remMethod.val: in(不) + equality(平等) → 不平等

trans.tranCn: 不平等， 不平均； 不同
trans.tranOther: an unfair situation, in which some groups in society have more money, opportunities, power etc than others
